search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Maximizer CRM (maximizer.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Maximizer CRM can be found at: [https://www.maximizer.com/pricing](https://www.maximizer.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
PRICING

Find the plan that works for you and your team
----------------------------------------------

The essentials for sales management.

$65

USD /month

$89

CAD/month

$89

AUD /month

€58

EUR /month

R875

ZAR /month

£50

GBP /month

Per user, billed annually, 3 user minimum

### Includes:

100,000 Contacts

100GB Database Size

Advanced Contact & Task Management

Microsoft Outlook Integration

[Learn more![Image 1](https://www.maximizer.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/link-arrow.svg)](https://www.maximizer.com/pricing#features-matrix)

Most Popular

AI-powered insights to guide sales teams.
